# Conference presentations and publications
```{r}
CV$entries_data %>%
  filter(section == 'conference_publication') %>%
  mutate(year = extract_year(start), .before = start) %>% 
  arrange(desc(year)) %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what = institution,
    when = glue::glue("{`start`}"),
    with = title,
    where = loc,
    why = description_bullets,
    # .protect = FALSE
  )
```
